reviewText: This is the IDEAL book for parents of a Karate student from White to Blue belt. The demonstrations in stances, punches, and kicks utilize the best form I have ever seen in a karate training video. It definitely exceeds the form quality at 95% of dojos. Utilizing this book, your student will be far ahead most of the rest of their class.
This was not a good quality video, sound was terrible!
we found the dvd  very slow and too repetitious wanted something to help us with the sequinces
good starter, not just for children
